news.title: Modeling Buildings by the Millions: Building Codes in China Tested for Energy Savings
news.summary: PNNL scientists at the Joint Global Change Research Institute, a partnership with the University of Maryland in College Park, Md., have created a unique model that projects how much energy can be saved with changes to China's building energy codes.
